entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 in the evening then steady. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 in the evening then steady. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023
